description: Try our easy to follow Nut Milk & Avocado Chocolate Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Nut Milk & Avocado Chocolate Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a 1L freezer-safe container and freeze for at least 4 hours. Remove from the freezer 5-10 minutes before serving. Using a hot spoon, scoop ice-cream into ice-cream cones, drizzle with melted chocolate and scatter with chopped hazelnuts.
